designations.source: A review of the scarce and threatened beetles of Great Britain: The leaf beetles and their allies
designations.source_description: The leaf beetles and their allies: Chrysomelidae, Megalopodidae and Orsodacnidae. D S Hubble. October 2014.
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: Taxa which are neither threatened nor near threatened.
designations.comments: Some evidence of decline in east and central England due to reduced habitat quality, but remains widespread in S England and Wales
